Leaflet plugin - Spanish providers

Source: R/addProviderEspTiles.R
addProviderEspTiles.Rd

Add tiles of leaflet-providersESP to a R leaflet map.

addProviderEspTiles(
  map,
  provider,
  layerId = NULL,
  group = NULL,
  options = providerEspTileOptions()
)

providerEspTileOptions(...)

Arguments

map, layerId, group, options

See addTiles
provider

Name of the provider, see leaflet.providersESP.df.
...

Additional options. See providerTileOptions.

Source

leaflet-providersESP leaflet plugin, v1.2.0.

Value

Modified map object.

Details

providerEspTileOptions is a wrapper of leaflet::providerTileOptions

See also

leaflet.providersESP.df, esp_getTiles

tileOptions, providerTileOptions

Author

dieghernan, https://github.com/dieghernan/

Examples

library(leaflet)
  PuertadelSol <-
    leaflet() %>% setView(lat = 40.4166,
                          lng = -3.7038400,
                          zoom = 18) %>%
    addProviderEspTiles(provider = "IGNBase.Gris") %>%
    addProviderEspTiles(provider = "RedTransporte.Carreteras")

    PuertadelSol

Contents

About mapSpain

Developed by Diego Hernangómez, part of the rOpenSpain project.

About rOpenSpain

rOpenSpain is a community of R enthusiasts whose ultimate goal is to create high-quality R packages for data mining public spanish open sources.

Site built with pkgdown 1.6.1.
